title: Introducing GPT-5
raw_excerpt: We are introducing GPT‑5, our best AI system yet. GPT‑5 is a significant leap in intelligence over all our previous models, featuring state-of-the-art performance across coding, math, writing, health, visual perception, and more.
raw_body: We are introducing GPT‑5, our best AI system yet. GPT‑5 is a significant leap in intelligence over all our previous models, featuring state-of-the-art performance across coding, math, writing, health, visual perception, and more.
speedrun: The introduction of GPT-5 marks a groundbreaking advancement in AI technology, showcasing superior capabilities in various domains including coding, math, writing, health, and visual perception. This leap in intelligence promises to enhance productivity and innovation across multiple industries.
why_it_matters: GPT-5's advanced capabilities can streamline workflows in sectors like healthcare and education, potentially reducing costs and improving outcomes for businesses and consumers alike.
The model's enhanced performance in coding and writing may democratize access to technology, empowering individuals and small businesses to leverage AI for creative and technical projects.

lenses.eli12: GPT-5 is a new AI that can do many things better than before, like solving math problems and writing stories. This is exciting because it can help people work faster and smarter in their daily lives.
lenses.pm: Businesses in tech, healthcare, and education will utilize GPT-5 to automate tasks and improve efficiency. It addresses challenges like high operational costs and slow processes, providing a competitive edge while posing risks of reliance on AI.
lenses.engineer: GPT-5 employs advanced neural network architectures and training methods to achieve its high performance. While it excels in various tasks, it may still face limitations in understanding context and nuance, which could affect its reliability in critical applications.
